author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: A penny saved is a penny earned.

author: Warren Buffett
quote: Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving.

author: Proverb
quote: Save money and money will save you.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: Beware of little expenses; a small leak will sink a great ship.

author: Samuel Johnson
quote: If you wish to get rich, save what you get. A fool can earn money; but it takes a wise man to save and dispose of it to his own advantage.

author: Joe Moore
quote: A simple fact that is hard to learn is that the time to save money is when you have some.

author: Sophocles
quote: There is no harm in taking a second bite of the cherry.

author: Josh Billings
quote: It is the person who does not know where his next dollar is coming from who is the hardest to satisfy. The fellow for whom it is earned by somebody else is the one who protests that the country is going to the dogs.

author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
quote: Happiness in this world, when it comes, comes incidentally. Make it the object of pursuit, and it leads us on a wild-goose chase and is never attained.

author: Suze Orman
quote: Saving is a very fine thing. Especially when your parents have done it for you.
